original_text: But the soldiers of Babylon's army chased after them. They caught Zedekiah on the flat land near Jericho. They took him to King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon at Riblah, in the region called Hamath. King Nebuchadnezzar decided that Zedekiah was guilty.
korean_text: 갈대아인의 군대가 그들을 따라 여리고 평원에서 시드기야에게 미쳐 그를 잡아서 데리고 하맛 땅 립나에 있는 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕에게로 올라가매 왕이 그를 심문하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the soldiers of Babylon's army chased after them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 바빌론 군대의 병사들이 그들을 쫓아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They caught Zedekiah on the flat land near Jericho.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여리고 근처 평원에서 시드기야를 붙잡았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took him to King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon at Riblah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 리블라에 있는 바빌론의 느부갓네살 왕에게 데려갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar decided that Zedekiah was guilty.
